sentences.en: Alternatively, the dead could have been killed on the spot in "the swampy valley environment", the paper concludes.
sentences.cn: 另一种可能是，这些死者是在有“沼泽河谷环境”的地点被杀害的——论文总结道。

sentences.en: An ox as grazing in a swampy meadow.
sentences.cn: 一头牛在一块泥泞的草地上吃草.

sentences.en: Jamestown , though it possessed a good harbor, was swampy, infested with mosquitoes, and lacked freshwater sources.
sentences.cn: 詹姆斯敦, 虽然真的是个很好的港口, 但太过沼泽化, 被蚊虫寄生, 且缺乏新鲜的水源.

sentences.en: Malaria is still rampant in some swampy regions.
sentences.cn: 疟疾在一些沼泽地区仍很猖獗.

sentences.en: Many surface waters , particularly those emanating from swampy areas, are often colored to the extent.
sentences.cn: 许多地表水, 特别是由沼泽地区流出的地表水常常染上一定程度的颜色.

sentences.en: Murky: More than deeply colored; lacking brightness, turbid and sometimes a bIt'swampy.
sentences.cn: 黑暗的: 比深色更浓; 缺乏亮度, 混浊且有时显得有点如沼泽般松软.

sentences.en: On rare clearings in this swampy hell a few Finno-Ugric tribes eventually appeared and left many burial mounts behind, with some of them still belowground because of impassibility of the swamp.
sentences.cn: 在这难得如此空旷的沼泽地狱里，几个芬兰乌戈尔部落终于出现了，身后留下了许多坟墓，其中有些还是地下，因为的沼泽是那么不近人情。

sentences.en: Slip and slide, fast and strong, basking by the stream on a swampy log.
sentences.cn: 滑啊滑, 又快又狠, 在沼泽地里得意的穿梭.

sentences.en: The digging revealed the temple's foundation and the road to the now swampy site.
sentences.cn: 发掘工作使神庙的地基和通往现在已是沼泽的旧址的道路重见天日.

sentences.en: The hurricane first hit land in remote swampy areas of the miskito coast and moved through villages further inland.
sentences.cn: 飓风首次登陆的地点为米斯基托海岸偏僻的沼泽地区，并越过村庄向内陆深入。

sentences.en: They can be found essentially in swampy regions and humid zones.
sentences.cn: 他们基本生活在沼泽的区域和潮湿的地域中.

sentences.en: They could not move their heavy mortars over the swampy ground.
sentences.cn: 他们无法把重型迫击炮移过那片沼泽地.

words.tran_cn: 下沉；陷入沼泽；陷入困境；不知所措（过去式swamped，过去分词swamped，现在分词swamping，第三人称单数swamps，名词swampiness，形容词swampy）
使陷于沼泽；使沉没；使陷入困境
[地理][水文]沼泽的；湿地的；沼泽多的；松软的

trans.tran_cn: 沼泽的，似沼泽的，软而湿的
trans.tran_en: A swampy area of land is always very wet
